titles.title: A joint resolution designating the week beginning May 2, 1993, as "National Mental Health Counselors Week".

vote.text: Introduced in the Senate, read twice, considered, read the third time, and passed without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 4/27/1993--Introduced. Designates the week beginning May 2, 1993, as National Mental Health Counselors Week.
